title: Heartlands with Dean Graetz : dust
brief_description: A recollection on the days when, as a child, dust storms would assail the buildings and school children would be sent home leads the adult Dean Graetz on an exploration of what percentage of Australia’s land can support its inhabitants, what has been lost, and why its happened.
